docs.snippet: He was feared for twisting intelligence to back his bellicosity and for trying to remove anyone who objected.
The British, who have threatened to withhold important evidence about the two men as leverage, also want them prosecuted in a civilian court, rather than being taken to Guantánamo Bay.
